nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(device_name) AS 'Device Name', latest(src_addr) AS 'Device IP', latest(kentik.snmp.Uptime)/8640000 AS 'Uptime (Days)', latest(SysObjectID) AS 'SysObjectID', latest(entity.type) AS 'NR Entity Type', latest(instrumentation.name) AS 'Ktranslate Profile', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', latest(PollingHealth) AS 'Polling Health', latest(PollingHealthReason) AS 'Health Reason' WHERE provider = 'kentik-server-chassis'

From Metric SELECT latest(cpqRackServerBladeStatus), latest(cpqRackServerBladePresent), latest(cpqRackServerBladePOSTStatus), latest(kentik.snmp.cpqRackServerBladeFaultMajor) as cpqRackServerBladeFaultMajor, latest(kentik.snmp.cpqRackServerBladeFaultMinor) as cpqRackServerBladeFaultMinor, latest(cpqRackServerBladeFaultDiagnosticString), latest(cpqRackServerBladePowered), latest(cpqRackServerBladeUIDState), latest(cpqRackServerBladePartNumber), latest(cpqRackServerBladeHasFuses), latest(cpqRackServerBladeSerialNum), latest(cpqRackServerBladeProductId), latest(cpqRackServerBladeUid)  WHERE provider = 'kentik-server-chassis' FACET cpqRackServerBladeName, cpqRackServerBladePosition limit max

From Metric SELECT latest(cpqRackCommonEnclosureManagerCondition), latest(cpqRackCommonEnclosureManagerRole), latest(cpqRackCommonEnclosureManagerPresent), latest(cpqRackCommonEnclosureManagerRedundant), latest(cpqRackCommonEnclosureManagerSerialNum) WHERE provider = 'kentik-server-chassis' FACET cpqRackCommonEnclosureManagerEnclosureName, cpqRackCommonEnclosureManagerLocation limit max

From Metric SELECT latest(cpqRackPowerEnclosureCondition), latest(cpqRackPowerEnclosureMgmtBoardSerialNum), latest(cpqRackPowerEnclosureRedundant), latest(cpqRackPowerEnclosureLoadBalanced), latest(cpqRackPowerEnclosureInputPwrType), latest(cpqRackPowerEnclosurePwrFeedMax), latest(cpqRackPowerEnclosureBladeAutopoweron) WHERE provider = 'kentik-server-chassis' FACET cpqRackPowerEnclosureName, cpqRackCommonEnclosureTempLocation limit max
From Metric SELECT latest(cpqRackCommonEnclosureFanCondition), latest(cpqRackCommonEnclosureFanPresent) WHERE provider = 'kentik-server-chassis' FACET cpqRackCommonEnclosureFanLocation limit max

From Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.cpqRackCommonEnclosureTempCurrent) as cpqRackCommonEnclosureTempCurrent, latest(cpqRackCommonEnclosureTempCondition), latest(cpqRackCommonEnclosureTempType)  WHERE provider = 'kentik-server-chassis' FACET cpqRackCommonEnclosureTempSensorEnclosureName, cpqRackCommonEnclosureTempLocation limit max

From Metric SELECT latest(cpqRackPowerSupplyPresent), latest(cpqRackPowerSupplyCondition), latest(cpqRackPowerSupplyStatus), latest(cpqRackPowerSupplyInputLineStatus), latest(kentik.snmp.cpqRackPowerSupplyCurPwrOutput) as cpqRackPowerSupplyCurPwrOutput, latest(cpqRackPowerSupplyMaxPwrOutput), latest(kentik.snmp.cpqRackPowerSupplyIntakeTemp) as cpqRackPowerSupplyIntakeTemp, latest(kentik.snmp.cpqRackPowerSupplyExhaustTemp) as cpqRackPowerSupplyExhaustTemp WHERE provider = 'kentik-server-chassis' FACET cpqRackPowerSupplyEnclosureName, cpqRackPowerSupplyEnclosureSerialNum, cpqRackPowerSupplySerialNum limit max

From Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.cpqRackServerTempSensorCurrent) as cpqRackServerTempSensorCurrent, latest(cpqRackServerTempSensorCondition), latest(cpqRackServerTempSensorType)  WHERE provider = 'kentik-server-chassis' FACET cpqRackServerTempSensorName, cpqRackServerTempSensorLocation limit max

From Metric SELECT latest(cpqRackCommonEnclosureFusePresent), latest(cpqRackCommonEnclosureFuseCondition) WHERE provider = 'kentik-server-chassis' FACET Index, cpqRackCommonEnclosureFuseEnclosureName, cpqRackCommonEnclosureFuseLocation limit max
